title: "Horizontal exit" means an exit which is a protected opening through or around a fire wall or a bridge connecting two or more buildings
clause_text: "Horizontal exit" means an exit which is a protected opening through or around a fire wall or a bridge connecting two or more buildings.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "Horizontal exit" means an exit which is a protected opening through or around a fire wall or a bridge connecting two or more buildings.
